title: Kelly: Miami Dolphins ‘Can Be a 10-Win Team’
content:
Does the Sun Sentinel’s Omar Kelly agree with Big O’s 9-7 projection for the 2015 Miami Dolphins? 
 
“That’s a safe number,” Kelly said on the Big O Show . “I think if they have a lucky season from an injury standpoint and don’t miss too many key or difference-making players, I believe they can be a 10-win team. I’ve really seen a lot of improvement from Ryan Tannehill. I think he’s ready to take that next step as an NFL quarterback and to me that was the missing ingredient for the team. Now the question is can they stay healthy? And if they can’t you’re probably looking at a 7-9 team.”
